CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Expanded view for profile card
CurrentVersion.description: With the expanded view of the profile card, users will now be able to see a richer view of a person's profile, such as their contact data, custom properties, and their LinkedIn information. This expansion also enables the user to view richer organization chart information about the person they are interacting with, without leaving the context they are in. Note: The launch state was incorrect and has now been changed to reflect the correct state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Expanded view for profile card
OldVersion.description: With the expanded view of the profile card, users will now be able to see a richer view of a person's profile, such as their contact data, custom properties, and their LinkedIn information. This expansion also enables the user to view richer organization chart information about the person they are interacting with, without leaving the context they are in. Note: The launch state was incorrect and has now been changed to reflect the correct state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Apply Purview Message Encryption branding with DLP policy (U.S. Government clouds)
CurrentVersion.description: Purview Messaging Encryption supports customized branding templates for encrypted mail sent to external recipients. The functionality is being brought to Data Loss Prevention from Exchange mail flow rule. In addition, DLP policies provide additional configuration to control whether Microsoft 365 external recipients will be able to view the encrypted mail inline using Outlook or the encrypted portal experience.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Apply Purview Message Encryption branding with DLP policy (U.S. Government clouds)
OldVersion.description: Purview Messaging Encryption supports customized branding templates for encrypted mail sent to external recipients. The functionality is being brought to Data Loss Prevention from Exchange mail flow rule. In addition, DLP policies provide additional configuration to control whether Microsoft 365 external recipients will be able to view the encrypted mail inline using Outlook or the encrypted portal experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Updates to Gallery View in Teams Meetings
CurrentVersion.description: The updated Gallery View places everyone in tiles of equal size by default (16:9 ratio) whether their video is on or off. Users can also easily change their gallery size, choose to prioritize tiles with video-on, and remove their tile from the main gallery. When a Microsoft Teams Room joins the meeting, video is optimized by enlarging the size by default and users can re-size via the contextual menu. Available only in the new Microsoft Teams experience.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Updates to Gallery View in Teams Meetings
OldVersion.description: The updated Gallery View places everyone in tiles of equal size by default (16:9 ratio) whether their video is on or off. Users can also easily change their gallery size, choose to prioritize tiles with video-on, and remove their tile from the main gallery. When a Microsoft Teams Room joins the meeting, video is optimized by enlarging the size by default and users can re-size via the contextual menu. Available only in the new Microsoft Teams experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Ability to recommend course to groups in Viva Learning
CurrentVersion.description: Allows users to use existing user groups while making recommendations.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Ability to recommend course to groups
OldVersion.description:
Allows users to use existing user groups while
making recommendations.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Search relevance improvements in Viva Learning
CurrentVersion.description: Improvements to relevancy of search results in Viva Learning including attribute boosting, spell correction, exact match, and personalized results based on interests.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Search relevance improvements in Viva Learning
OldVersion.description:
Improvements to relevancy of search results in
Viva Learning including attribute boosting, spell correction, exact match, and
personalized results based on interests.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal : Insider Risk Management – Real-time policy tuning analysis
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Policy tuning analysis provides admins with a real-time prediction based on the number of users that could match a given set of policy conditions. It helps organizations efficiently adjust the selection of indicators and thresholds of activity occurrence, so they don’t have too few or too many alerts from a policy. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/microsoft-365/compliance/insider-risk-management?view=o365-worldwide

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal : Insider Risk Management – Real-time policy tuning analysis
OldVersion.description:
,Policy tuning analysis provides admins with a real-time prediction based on the number of users that could match a given set of policy conditions. It helps organizations efficiently adjust the selection of indicators and thresholds of activity occurrence, so they don’t have too few or too many alerts from a policy. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/microsoft-365/compliance/insider-risk-management?view=o365-worldwide

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Policy Tips revamp on Outlook Win32 desktop (U.S. Government clouds)
CurrentVersion.description: Expand the functionality of DLP Policy Tips in Outlook Win32 to support additional top predicates and exceptions, and advanced classification for E5 users. Note: We are adjusting the roadmap release phase to reflect the current state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Policy Tips revamp on Outlook Win32 desktop (U.S. Government clouds)
OldVersion.description: Expand the functionality of DLP Policy Tips in Outlook Win32 to support additional top predicates and exceptions, and advanced classification for E5 users. Note: We are adjusting the roadmap release phase to reflect the current state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Configure policy tips as popups for labeled emails and attachments (U.S. Government clouds)
CurrentVersion.description: Configure DLP rules that display warnings in a popup dialog before sending emails. With this capability, admins can set up rules to provide warnings, require business justifications, or request explicit acknowledgements before sending emails. Furthermore, admins can customize a Compliance URL within a DLP rule, ensuring that end users receive valuable guidance through the popup.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Configure policy tips as popups for labeled emails and attachments (U.S. Government clouds)
OldVersion.description: Configure DLP rules that display warnings in a popup dialog before sending emails. With this capability, admins can set up rules to provide warnings, require business justifications, or request explicit acknowledgements before sending emails. Furthermore, admins can customize a Compliance URL within a DLP rule, ensuring that end users receive valuable guidance through the popup.

CurrentVersion.title: Excel: Office Scripts now available in Government Community Cloud (GCC)
CurrentVersion.description: Office Scripts enable users with all levels of Excel experience, from beginners to those with advanced coding expertise, to automate repetitive spreadsheet tasks in Excel. Scripts can be created with the Action Recorder or the Code Editor using the Office Scripts API and run in an Excel workbook. Office Scripts will soon become available to GCC users on Windows, Mac, and the web.

OldVersion.title: Excel: Office Scripts now available in Government Community Cloud (GCC)
OldVersion.description: Office Scripts enable users with all levels of Excel experience, from beginners to those with advanced coding expertise, to automate repetitive spreadsheet tasks in Excel. Scripts can be created with the Action Recorder or the Code Editor using the Office Scripts API and run in an Excel workbook. Office Scripts will soon become available to GCC users on Windows, Mac, and the web.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: New Outlook for Windows and web - Find Related Search (Sender & Conversation)
CurrentVersion.description: Find related search allows users to search for similar emails based on one selected from the message list. Right clicking an email and selecting "Find related" offers users the chance to search for “Messages in this conversation” and “Messages from sender”.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: New Outlook for Windows and web - Find Related Search (Sender & Conversation)
OldVersion.description:
Find related search allows users to search for
similar emails based on one selected from the message list. Right clicking an
email and selecting "Find related" offers users the chance to search
for “Messages in this conversation” and “Messages from sender”.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Download learner's progress data in Viva Learning
CurrentVersion.description: Allow admins to download learners progress data.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Download Learner's progress data
OldVersion.description: Allow admins to download learners progress data.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Sensitivity analysis for policy tuning
CurrentVersion.description:
,
With this update, admins with appropriate permissions will have the ability to view a sensitivity analysis, which shows the count of users in the organization that would meet specific indicator thresholds. The sensitivity analysis is presented as a bar chart, with potential inputs of an indicator threshold on the x-axis and the corresponding count of users on the y-axis. Admins can utilize this chart to make informed decisions on which threshold to apply for each indicator. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability to set the availability by specific date in Shifts
CurrentVersion.description: Currently, we solely permit the frontline workers to establish daily recurring availability. With this new feature, we are enabling Frontline workers to set the availability for a specific date/time, in addition to recurring availability.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability to set the availability by specific date in Shifts
OldVersion.description: Currently, we solely permit the frontline workers to establish daily recurring availability. With this new feature, we are enabling Frontline workers to set the availability for a specific date/time, in addition to recurring availability.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Enabling cameras with IntelliFrame and People Recognition experiences in the new Microsoft Teams app
CurrentVersion.description: Remote attendees in a hybrid meeting will be able to view multi-stream IntelliFrame video, panoramic room view, and in-room attendees with speaker recognition (including name labels) in the new Teams desktop client.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Enabling cameras with IntelliFrame and People Recognition experiences in the new Microsoft Teams app
OldVersion.description: Remote attendees in a hybrid meeting will be able to view multi-stream IntelliFrame video, panoramic room view, and in-room attendees with speaker recognition (including name labels) in the new Teams desktop client.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Syntex: Translation
CurrentVersion.description: A new service that enables users to translate documents quickly and accurately among dozens of languages based on specific metadata or on-demand.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Syntex: Translation
OldVersion.description: A new service that enables users to translate documents quickly and accurately among dozens of languages based on specific metadata or on-demand.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Self service to customize reminders
CurrentVersion.description: Ability to customize survey reminders, nudges and other notifications and support additional languages

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Self service to customize reminders
OldVersion.description: Ability to customize survey reminders, nudges and other notifications and support additional languages

CurrentVersion.title: Information Protection - Changes in Sensitivity labels to control Microsoft Teams shared channels and private team discoverability
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Information Protection - Controls while adding/editing Sensitivity labels to manage Microsoft Teams shared channels settings and private team discoverability.

OldVersion.title: Information Protection - Changes in Sensitivity labels to control Microsoft Teams shared channels and private team discoverability
OldVersion.description:
,
Information Protection - Controls while adding/editing Sensitivity labels to manage Microsoft Teams shared channels settings and private team discoverability.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Ability to hide Favorites from folder list
CurrentVersion.description: The Hide Favorites feature allows users to personalize their folder pane by hiding the Favorites section. By default, Favorites will be visible, but with this feature, users have the option to hide the Favorites experience from their view. Once hidden, users can always go back and unhide their Favorites.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Ability to hide Favorites from folder list
OldVersion.description:
The Hide Favorites
feature allows users to personalize their folder pane by hiding the Favorites
section. By default, Favorites will be visible, but with this feature, users
have the option to hide the Favorites experience from their view. Once hidden,
users can always go back and unhide their Favorites.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Message Recall on Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Exchange Online's Cloud-based Message Recall feature will be coming to Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Message Recall on Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows
OldVersion.description: Exchange Online's Cloud-based Message Recall feature will be coming to Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Conditional Formatting in New Outlook for Windows and Web
CurrentVersion.description: Conditional formatting is a feature to make messages that meet defined conditions stand out in the message list by using different font colors. The users can specify conditions that an incoming message should meet, such as a sender’s name or email address.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Conditional Formatting in New Outlook for Windows and Web
OldVersion.description: Conditional formatting is a feature to make messages that meet defined conditions stand out in the message list by using different font colors. The users can specify conditions that an incoming message should meet, such as a sender’s name or email address.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Home
CurrentVersion.description: Viva Home is the home for the Viva suite on the web. Accessible via microsoft365.com app launcher and app explorer, it provides a single landing destination on the web for Viva users with the goal to help with education, discovery and navigation to licensed Viva modules.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Home
OldVersion.description:
Viva Home is the home for the Viva suite on the web.
Accessible via microsoft365.com app launcher and app explorer, it provides a
single landing destination on the web for Viva users with the goal to help with
education, discovery and navigation to licensed Viva modules.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Microsoft Tunnel - Gateway Scaling
CurrentVersion.description: Increase the number of clients supported per Tunnel gateway server from 5,000 to over 20,000 per server.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Microsoft Tunnel - Gateway Scaling
OldVersion.description: Increase the number of clients supported per Tunnel gateway server from 5,000 to over 20,000 per server.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery (Premium) Jobs report - access for eDiscovery Manager
CurrentVersion.description: ,The access to the Jobs Report in eDiscovery (Premium) will be extended to eDiscovery Managers. eD Managers will be able to view the tenant wide quota available and list of jobs in the cases they have access to.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery (Premium) Jobs report - access for eDiscovery Manager
OldVersion.description: ,The access to the Jobs Report in eDiscovery (Premium) will be extended to eDiscovery Managers. eD Managers will be able to view the tenant wide quota available and list of jobs in the cases they have access to.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Track Read Receipts within Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: We're developing the ability to view the updated Read Receipt status of recipients from the sent item directly.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Track Read Receipts within Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows
OldVersion.description: We're developing the ability to view the updated Read Receipt status of recipients from the sent item directly.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Stream videos can now be watched inline in Outlook
CurrentVersion.description: We’re introducing the ability to watch Stream videos inline in Outlook on the web and the new Outlook for Windows. Soon, if someone pastes a Stream video link in a supported Outlook app and sends it to you, you will be able to watch it directly in your inbox. The videos will play inline for recipients within the same organization, meaning you will not have to leave Outlook to watch the video. Recipients outside the organization, and those not using the new Outlook or web, will see a link to the video which they can watch in the Stream web app (depending on the organization’s file sharing settings).

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Stream videos can now be watched inline in Outlook
OldVersion.description: We’re introducing the ability to watch Stream videos inline in Outlook on the web and the new Outlook for Windows. Soon, if someone pastes a Stream video link in a supported Outlook app and sends it to you, you will be able to watch it directly in your inbox. The videos will play inline for recipients within the same organization, meaning you will not have to leave Outlook to watch the video. Recipients outside the organization, and those not using the new Outlook or web, will see a link to the video which they can watch in the Stream web app (depending on the organization’s file sharing settings).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent Meeting Recap for transcript-only meetings (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Intelligent recap will support meetings with only transcript enabled, and without recording enabled. In the case when only transcript is enabled for a meeting, the features from intelligent recap that users can access are AI-generated meeting notes, AI-generated tasks, and name mentions. Intelligent recap features are also available as a part of the Copilot for Microsoft 365 license.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent Meeting Recap for transcript-only meetings (Premium)
OldVersion.description: Intelligent recap will support meetings with only transcript enabled, and without recording enabled. In the case when only transcript is enabled for a meeting, the features from intelligent recap that users can access are AI-generated meeting notes, AI-generated tasks, and name mentions. Intelligent recap features are also available as a part of the Copilot for Microsoft 365 license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent Meeting Recap for scheduled channel meetings (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Intelligent recap is now available for scheduled channel meetings, so users can easily browse the meeting recording by speakers and topics, as well as access AI-generated meeting notes, AI-generated tasks, and name mentions. Intelligent recap features are also available as a part of the Copilot for Microsoft 365 license.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent Meeting Recap for scheduled channel meetings (Premium)
OldVersion.description: Intelligent recap is now available for scheduled channel meetings, so users can easily browse the meeting recording by speakers and topics, as well as access AI-generated meeting notes, AI-generated tasks, and name mentions. Intelligent recap features are also available as a part of the Copilot for Microsoft 365 license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Azure protected voicemail on Teams App
CurrentVersion.description: Teams users will now have link to their Azure protected voicemails from the Teams App. Users will get notification for the voicemail on the Teams App and can open the attached link to access the voicemail on the web browser.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Azure protected voicemail on Teams App
OldVersion.description: Teams users will now have link to their Azure protected voicemails from the Teams App. Users will get notification for the voicemail on the Teams App and can open the attached link to access the voicemail on the web browser.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Control your activity notifications from the activity card
CurrentVersion.description: Users will be able to control what shows in their activity feed by clicking on the ellipsis from the activity card, helping them to stay on top of the information that matters most to them.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Control your activity notifications from the activity card
OldVersion.description:
Users will be able to
control what shows in their activity feed by clicking on the ellipsis from the
activity card, helping them to stay on top of the information that matters most
to them.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Discover feed for channels
CurrentVersion.description: Users can access a personalized feed based on important updates in the channels they are a part of.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Discover feed for channels
OldVersion.description:
Users
can access a personalized feed based on important updates in the channels they
are a part of.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Audio and video flyout and settings in Teams meetings
CurrentVersion.description: The Audio and Video Flyout is designed to make it easier and more efficient for users to manage their audio and video settings during Teams meetings. Users can easily toggle features on and off with visual indicators for both audio and video settings, eliminating the need to navigate deep into the settings menu to make adjustments.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Audio and video flyout and settings in Teams meetings
OldVersion.description:
The Audio and Video
Flyout is designed to make it easier and more efficient for users to manage
their audio and video settings during Teams meetings. Users can easily toggle
features on and off with visual indicators for both audio and video settings,
eliminating the need to navigate deep into the settings menu to make
adjustments.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Choose how many days of emails sync to your device for offline usage
CurrentVersion.description: With the new sync window, you can choose how many days' worth of emails and attachments you want to download to your device so you can always access them even while offline.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Choose how many days of emails sync to your device for offline usage
OldVersion.description:
With the new sync window, you can choose how many days' worth of emails and attachments you want to
download to your device so you can always access them even while offline.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Hide general channel
CurrentVersion.description: Alike other channels, now you will be able to hide general channels in your teams, helping you focus on the channels that matter most to you.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Latest meeting experiences with performance improvements on web for Safari and Firefox (for anonymous join only)
CurrentVersion.description: The latest Teams meeting experiences will be available for Teams on the web in Safari and Firefox browsers - including performance improvements, refreshed pre-join, updated meeting stage, and the updated meeting toolbar. (for anonymous join only)

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Latest meeting experiences with performance improvements on web for Safari and Firefox (for anonymous join only)
OldVersion.description: The latest Teams meeting experiences will be available for Teams on the web in Safari and Firefox browsers - including performance improvements, refreshed pre-join, updated meeting stage, and the updated meeting toolbar. (for anonymous join only)

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Automatic Targeting based on roles for Frontline
CurrentVersion.description: Frontline teams can notify the right set of colleagues on channel posts (e.g. notify colleagues in specific role or department)

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Enhanced Classification Support for Thai language in Exchange Online, Microsoft Teams, SharePoint, and OneDrive
CurrentVersion.description: ,In our continued efforts to enhance classification capabilities, we have added a new feature, Word-Breaker, to our existing Thai Language support in Classification. Words in Thai language sentences do not have spaces between them. And for classification purpose, we relied on the right keywords to be added while creating Sensitive Information Type for ensuring accurate match. However, with this feature, spaces will be added automatically in keywords which will ensure higher match accuracy across all cloud locations (Exchange, Teams, One Drive, SharePoint).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention- Out-of-box Advanced Hunting queries for Data Loss Prevention incidents in Microsoft 365 Defender
CurrentVersion.description: Organizations can click the "Go Hunt” dropdown from the DLP alert page in Microsoft 365 Defender and select from a list of pre-populated queries for common scenarios such as understanding if a file is shared externally, participants of a Teams meetings, and more.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention- Adding matched attachment details in Activity Explorer for Data Loss Prevention rules in Exchange
CurrentVersion.description: ,With this feature, the admins can see more information like name, size, labels about the attachments present in the email that violated the Data Loss Prevention rules.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention- Adding matched attachment details in Activity Explorer for Data Loss Prevention rules in Exchange
OldVersion.description: With this feature, the admins can see more information like name, size, labels about the attachments present in the email that violated the Data Loss Prevention rules.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Walkie Talkie Support for Multiple Channels
CurrentVersion.description: We've integrated Walkie Talkie in Teams with the dedicated push-to-talk (PTT) button on specialized headsets to instantly brings up walkie talkie for clear and secure voice communication. In addition to select specialized headsets, Walkie Talkie in Teams will now work with any generic wired (USB-C and 3.5mm) headsets on Android. As long as the generic headsets have a control button to play/pause or to accept/decline calls, frontline workers can tap the button to start and stop transmissions on walkie talkie.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Walkie Talkie Support for Multiple Channels
OldVersion.description: Walkie Talkie, a push-to-talk experience that enables clear and secure voice communication over the cloud, enables teams to communicate instantly on a channel. Through this new functionality, users can now join up to 5 channels in multi-channel mode, easily switch between these preselected channels to listen to incoming transmission or initiate PTT transmissions.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: OneDrive for Business Opens in-app for Outlook on the web
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Quickly access your OneDrive without having to leave Outlook! Previously, the OneDrive button in Outlook opened a new tab for OneDrive; with this change, you will see OneDrive inline for a consistent and fast experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent Meeting Recap on Teams Mobile (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Intelligent recap is now available on Teams for iOS and Android, so users can access AI-generated meeting notes, AI-generated tasks, and name mentions, and easily browse the meeting recording by speakers. Intelligent recap features are also available as a part of the Copilot for Microsoft 365 license.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent Meeting Recap on Teams Mobile (Premium)
OldVersion.description: Intelligent recap is now available on Teams for iOS and Android, so users can access AI-generated meeting notes, AI-generated tasks, and name mentions, and easily browse the meeting recording by speakers. Intelligent recap features are also available as a part of the Copilot for Microsoft 365 license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Preset Organizational Backgrounds (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: When enabled, a user will have a preset background defined by the IT admin without the ability to change the background.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting options updates for Webinars
CurrentVersion.description: The meeting options for a webinar are now accessible within the webinar setup in Teams. Organizers can edit meeting options in an inline window within the scheduling form in Teams.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 Admin Center: Improved issue details for service health
CurrentVersion.description:
We are introducing a new version of the service health issue details pane (the surface that appears when you click on a service incident or service advisory to view details).

The new version substantially reduces the amount of duplicated text and brings key information forward with improved formatting.  This gives you quicker access to the information you need, reducing the time and effort required to get up to speed on service incident details.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365 Admin Center: Improved issue details for service health
OldVersion.description:
We are introducing a new version of the service health issue details pane (the surface that appears when you click on a service incident or service advisory to view details).

The new version substantially reduces the amount of duplicated text and brings key information forward with improved formatting.  This gives you quicker access to the information you need, reducing the time and effort required to get up to speed on service incident details.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Admin setting for uploading files using drag-drop
CurrentVersion.description: Admin will be able to control the default content app for local files uploaded using drag-drop in chat and channels. OneDrive / SharePoint are the existing default locations for uploads using drag-drop.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Admin setting for uploading files using drag-drop
OldVersion.description: Admin will be able to control the default content app for local files uploaded using drag-drop in chat and channels. OneDrive / SharePoint are the existing default locations for uploads using drag-drop.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Registration Form Updates in Webinars
CurrentVersion.description: Organizers can rearrange the sequence of registration form questions that are presented to attendees during the webinar registration process. The questions available for reordering include address, city, state, zip/post code, country/region, job title organization, industry, and custom questions.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Usage reports - Microsoft Copilot with Graph-grounded chat
CurrentVersion.description: ,Microsoft Copilot with Graph-grounded chat usage metrics will be included in the Copilot for Microsoft 365 Usage report. This new feature provides additional usage insights and informs adoption strategy decisions for Microsoft Copilot in your organization.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Connected actions - Viva Pulse integration into Viva Insights Leader deep dive reports
CurrentVersion.description: ,Leaders can send Viva Pulse surveys tailored to new out-of-the-box reports from the Viva Insights app in Microsoft Teams at anytime to add additional context to workplace metrics.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Section Background
CurrentVersion.description: SharePoint now allows you to add an image or gradient color to the sections of the page from a new set of options, including image settings to ensure readability. With this release, we're providing authors to make beautiful pages with featured sections.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Custom image as Section Background
CurrentVersion.description: SharePoint lets you customize the sections backgrounds with your own image. We've enhanced the focal point and introduced more settings like fill mode, overlay, opacity to help you adhere to accessibility best practices and make sure that your contents are clear and readable with customized background. This gives you more power over the image to make your page beautiful.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Windows enrollment attestation
CurrentVersion.description: ,Physical Windows devices will be attested at enrollment that enrollment credentials are stored in the hardware of the device. Administrators can view device attestations in the new Device attestation status report and manually force attestation from that report.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Organize and reorder folders in the new Outlook for Windows and web
CurrentVersion.description: Users can arrange folders in any desired order effortlessly by dragging and dropping the folders in the position that they want.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: New options to copy email items in the new Outlook for Windows and web
CurrentVersion.description: We're thrilled to introduce two new ways to copy email items in the new Outlook for web and Windows that will make your email management even more seamless and efficient.  Ctrl + Drag and Drop: Simply hold down the Ctrl key while dragging and dropping your email items to effortlessly duplicate them. It's a quick and intuitive way to manage your emails with precision.  Ctrl C + Ctrl V: For those who prefer the classic copy-and-paste method, we've got you covered! Just use Ctrl C to copy the email item and Ctrl V to paste it wherever you need.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: New context menu experience in the new Outlook for Windows and web
CurrentVersion.description: We're thrilled to bring you an enhanced folder creation experience! In this update, we've introduced a more intuitive way to manage your folders and accounts. Starting soon, the creation links will be removed, streamlining your interface for a cleaner and more efficient workspace.  What's New: A new ellipsis icon will appear in your left nav bar when hovering the folders and accounts for a quick and easy way to create folders, subfolders or execute the existing folder and account actions ensuring a smoother workflow.  As part of this update, we'll be removing creation links to provide a more focused and user-friendly experience. Rest assured, the traditional right-click method will still be available for your convenience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Code Snippets in Viva Engage
CurrentVersion.description:
Users will be able to add code snippets to their posts, discussions, replies, questions, polls, and praises on Viva Engage. 

Additionally, if customers are licensed for Answers in Viva Engage, this feature will also be available when asking questions on Answers.

To add code snippets, locate the new </> button on the publisher toolbar.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Real-time policy tuning analysis
CurrentVersion.description: Policy tuning analysis provides admins with a real-time policy alert prediction based on the number of users in a tenant that could potentially match a given set of policy conditions. It helps organizations efficiently adjust the selection of indicators and thresholds of activity occurrence, so they don’t have too few or too many alerts from a policy. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Filter Calendar Items in Message List in new Outlook for Windows and web
CurrentVersion.description: You can now filter your message list for conversations that have calendar invites when using the new Outlook for Windows and Outlook on the web. Getting an overview of new meetings you're invited to and RSVP-ing to them directly in the message list becomes much easier with this new filter.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Adding matched attachment details in Activity Explorer for Data Loss Prevention rules in Exchange
CurrentVersion.description: With this feature, the admins can see more information like name, size, labels about the attachments present in the email that violated the Data Loss Prevention rules.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: OneDrive for Business available in classic Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: ,Quickly access your OneDrive without having to leave Outlook! Users can find and use the OneDrive app in classic Outlook for Windows, for a consistent and fast experience.

CurrentVersion.title: OneNote: Loop components in OneNote
CurrentVersion.description: ,Tap into the real-time, online collaborative solution provided by Loop directly within the powerful multimodal OneNote canvas—the opportunities are endless. You can create or insert Loop components into your OneNote notebook. Navigate to Insert > Loop to create a new component or try pasting a link to an existing component to have it show up in your OneNote canvas.

CurrentVersion.title: Bookings: Bookings in GCC High and DoD
CurrentVersion.description: With this update, Bookings will be available to customers in GCC High and DoD environments.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Browser optimized playback for SuccessFactors content in Viva Learning
CurrentVersion.description: Desktop client content consumption for SuccessFactors content is enhanced with browser optimized playback.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Browser optimized playback for SuccessFactors content
OldVersion.description: Desktop client content consumption for SuccessFactors content is enhanced with browser optimized playback.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Expanded view for profile card
CurrentVersion.description: With the expanded view of the profile card, users will now be able to see a richer view of a person's profile, such as their contact data, custom properties, and their LinkedIn information. This expansion also enables the user to view richer organization chart information about the person they are interacting with, without leaving the context they are in. Note: The launch state was incorrect and has now been changed to reflect the correct state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Apply Purview Message Encryption branding with DLP policy (U.S. Government clouds)
CurrentVersion.description: Purview Messaging Encryption supports customized branding templates for encrypted mail sent to external recipients. The functionality is being brought to Data Loss Prevention from Exchange mail flow rule. In addition, DLP policies provide additional configuration to control whether Microsoft 365 external recipients will be able to view the encrypted mail inline using Outlook or the encrypted portal experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Updates to Gallery View in Teams Meetings
CurrentVersion.description: The updated Gallery View places everyone in tiles of equal size by default (16:9 ratio) whether their video is on or off. Users can also easily change their gallery size, choose to prioritize tiles with video-on, and remove their tile from the main gallery. When a Microsoft Teams Room joins the meeting, video is optimized by enlarging the size by default and users can re-size via the contextual menu. Available only in the new Microsoft Teams experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Ability to recommend course to groups in Viva Learning
CurrentVersion.description: Allows users to use existing user groups while making recommendations.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Search relevance improvements in Viva Learning
CurrentVersion.description: Improvements to relevancy of search results in Viva Learning including attribute boosting, spell correction, exact match, and personalized results based on interests.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal : Insider Risk Management – Real-time policy tuning analysis
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Policy tuning analysis provides admins with a real-time prediction based on the number of users that could match a given set of policy conditions. It helps organizations efficiently adjust the selection of indicators and thresholds of activity occurrence, so they don’t have too few or too many alerts from a policy. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/microsoft-365/compliance/insider-risk-management?view=o365-worldwide

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Policy Tips revamp on Outlook Win32 desktop (U.S. Government clouds)
CurrentVersion.description: Expand the functionality of DLP Policy Tips in Outlook Win32 to support additional top predicates and exceptions, and advanced classification for E5 users. Note: We are adjusting the roadmap release phase to reflect the current state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Configure policy tips as popups for labeled emails and attachments (U.S. Government clouds)
CurrentVersion.description: Configure DLP rules that display warnings in a popup dialog before sending emails. With this capability, admins can set up rules to provide warnings, require business justifications, or request explicit acknowledgements before sending emails. Furthermore, admins can customize a Compliance URL within a DLP rule, ensuring that end users receive valuable guidance through the popup.

CurrentVersion.title: Excel: Office Scripts now available in Government Community Cloud (GCC)
CurrentVersion.description: Office Scripts enable users with all levels of Excel experience, from beginners to those with advanced coding expertise, to automate repetitive spreadsheet tasks in Excel. Scripts can be created with the Action Recorder or the Code Editor using the Office Scripts API and run in an Excel workbook. Office Scripts will soon become available to GCC users on Windows, Mac, and the web.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: New Outlook for Windows and web - Find Related Search (Sender & Conversation)
CurrentVersion.description: Find related search allows users to search for similar emails based on one selected from the message list. Right clicking an email and selecting "Find related" offers users the chance to search for “Messages in this conversation” and “Messages from sender”.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Download learner's progress data in Viva Learning
CurrentVersion.description: Allow admins to download learners progress data.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Sensitivity analysis for policy tuning
CurrentVersion.description:
,
With this update, admins with appropriate permissions will have the ability to view a sensitivity analysis, which shows the count of users in the organization that would meet specific indicator thresholds. The sensitivity analysis is presented as a bar chart, with potential inputs of an indicator threshold on the x-axis and the corresponding count of users on the y-axis. Admins can utilize this chart to make informed decisions on which threshold to apply for each indicator. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Sensitivity analysis for policy tuning
CurrentVersion.description: With this update, admins with appropriate permissions will have the ability to view a sensitivity analysis, which shows the count of users in the organization that would meet specific indicator thresholds. The sensitivity analysis is presented as a bar chart, with potential inputs of an indicator threshold on the x-axis and the corresponding count of users on the y-axis. Admins can utilize this chart to make informed decisions on which threshold to apply for each indicator. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability to set the availability by specific date in Shifts
CurrentVersion.description: Currently, we solely permit the frontline workers to establish daily recurring availability. With this new feature, we are enabling Frontline workers to set the availability for a specific date/time, in addition to recurring availability.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Enabling cameras with IntelliFrame and People Recognition experiences in the new Microsoft Teams app
CurrentVersion.description: Remote attendees in a hybrid meeting will be able to view multi-stream IntelliFrame video, panoramic room view, and in-room attendees with speaker recognition (including name labels) in the new Teams desktop client.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Enabling cameras with IntelliFrame and People Recognition experiences in the new Microsoft Teams app
CurrentVersion.description: Remote attendees in a hybrid meeting will be able to view multi-stream IntelliFrame video, panoramic room view, and in-room attendees with speaker recognition (including name labels) in the new Teams desktop client.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Syntex: Translation
CurrentVersion.description: A new service that enables users to translate documents quickly and accurately among dozens of languages based on specific metadata or on-demand.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Self service to customize reminders
CurrentVersion.description: Ability to customize survey reminders, nudges and other notifications and support additional languages

CurrentVersion.title: Information Protection - Changes in Sensitivity labels to control Microsoft Teams shared channels and private team discoverability
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Information Protection - Controls while adding/editing Sensitivity labels to manage Microsoft Teams shared channels settings and private team discoverability.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Ability to hide Favorites from folder list
CurrentVersion.description: The Hide Favorites feature allows users to personalize their folder pane by hiding the Favorites section. By default, Favorites will be visible, but with this feature, users have the option to hide the Favorites experience from their view. Once hidden, users can always go back and unhide their Favorites.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Message Recall on Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Exchange Online's Cloud-based Message Recall feature will be coming to Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Conditional Formatting in New Outlook for Windows and Web
CurrentVersion.description: Conditional formatting is a feature to make messages that meet defined conditions stand out in the message list by using different font colors. The users can specify conditions that an incoming message should meet, such as a sender’s name or email address.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Home
CurrentVersion.description: Viva Home is the home for the Viva suite on the web. Accessible via microsoft365.com app launcher and app explorer, it provides a single landing destination on the web for Viva users with the goal to help with education, discovery and navigation to licensed Viva modules.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Microsoft Tunnel - Gateway Scaling
CurrentVersion.description: Increase the number of clients supported per Tunnel gateway server from 5,000 to over 20,000 per server.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery (Premium) Jobs report - access for eDiscovery Manager
CurrentVersion.description: ,The access to the Jobs Report in eDiscovery (Premium) will be extended to eDiscovery Managers. eD Managers will be able to view the tenant wide quota available and list of jobs in the cases they have access to.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Track Read Receipts within Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: We're developing the ability to view the updated Read Receipt status of recipients from the sent item directly.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Stream videos can now be watched inline in Outlook
CurrentVersion.description: We’re introducing the ability to watch Stream videos inline in Outlook on the web and the new Outlook for Windows. Soon, if someone pastes a Stream video link in a supported Outlook app and sends it to you, you will be able to watch it directly in your inbox. The videos will play inline for recipients within the same organization, meaning you will not have to leave Outlook to watch the video. Recipients outside the organization, and those not using the new Outlook or web, will see a link to the video which they can watch in the Stream web app (depending on the organization’s file sharing settings).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent Meeting Recap for transcript-only meetings (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Intelligent recap will support meetings with only transcript enabled, and without recording enabled. In the case when only transcript is enabled for a meeting, the features from intelligent recap that users can access are AI-generated meeting notes, AI-generated tasks, and name mentions. Intelligent recap features are also available as a part of the Copilot for Microsoft 365 license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent Meeting Recap for scheduled channel meetings (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Intelligent recap is now available for scheduled channel meetings, so users can easily browse the meeting recording by speakers and topics, as well as access AI-generated meeting notes, AI-generated tasks, and name mentions. Intelligent recap features are also available as a part of the Copilot for Microsoft 365 license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Azure protected voicemail on Teams App
CurrentVersion.description: Teams users will now have link to their Azure protected voicemails from the Teams App. Users will get notification for the voicemail on the Teams App and can open the attached link to access the voicemail on the web browser.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Control your activity notifications from the activity card
CurrentVersion.description: Users will be able to control what shows in their activity feed by clicking on the ellipsis from the activity card, helping them to stay on top of the information that matters most to them.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Discover feed for channels
CurrentVersion.description: Users can access a personalized feed based on important updates in the channels they are a part of.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Audio and video flyout and settings in Teams meetings
CurrentVersion.description: The Audio and Video Flyout is designed to make it easier and more efficient for users to manage their audio and video settings during Teams meetings. Users can easily toggle features on and off with visual indicators for both audio and video settings, eliminating the need to navigate deep into the settings menu to make adjustments.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Choose how many days of emails sync to your device for offline usage
CurrentVersion.description: With the new sync window, you can choose how many days' worth of emails and attachments you want to download to your device so you can always access them even while offline.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Hide general channel
CurrentVersion.description: Alike other channels, now you will be able to hide general channels in your teams, helping you focus on the channels that matter most to you.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Latest meeting experiences with performance improvements on web for Safari and Firefox (for anonymous join only)
CurrentVersion.description: The latest Teams meeting experiences will be available for Teams on the web in Safari and Firefox browsers - including performance improvements, refreshed pre-join, updated meeting stage, and the updated meeting toolbar. (for anonymous join only)

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Automatic Targeting based on roles for Frontline
CurrentVersion.description: Frontline teams can notify the right set of colleagues on channel posts (e.g. notify colleagues in specific role or department)

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Automatic Targeting based on roles for Frontline
CurrentVersion.description: Frontline teams can notify the right set of colleagues on channel posts (e.g. notify colleagues in specific role or department)

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Enhanced Classification Support for Thai language in Exchange Online, Microsoft Teams, SharePoint, and OneDrive
CurrentVersion.description: ,In our continued efforts to enhance classification capabilities, we have added a new feature, Word-Breaker, to our existing Thai Language support in Classification. Words in Thai language sentences do not have spaces between them. And for classification purpose, we relied on the right keywords to be added while creating Sensitive Information Type for ensuring accurate match. However, with this feature, spaces will be added automatically in keywords which will ensure higher match accuracy across all cloud locations (Exchange, Teams, One Drive, SharePoint).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention- Out-of-box Advanced Hunting queries for Data Loss Prevention incidents in Microsoft 365 Defender
CurrentVersion.description: Organizations can click the "Go Hunt” dropdown from the DLP alert page in Microsoft 365 Defender and select from a list of pre-populated queries for common scenarios such as understanding if a file is shared externally, participants of a Teams meetings, and more.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention- Adding matched attachment details in Activity Explorer for Data Loss Prevention rules in Exchange
CurrentVersion.description: ,With this feature, the admins can see more information like name, size, labels about the attachments present in the email that violated the Data Loss Prevention rules.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Walkie Talkie Support for Multiple Channels
CurrentVersion.description: We've integrated Walkie Talkie in Teams with the dedicated push-to-talk (PTT) button on specialized headsets to instantly brings up walkie talkie for clear and secure voice communication. In addition to select specialized headsets, Walkie Talkie in Teams will now work with any generic wired (USB-C and 3.5mm) headsets on Android. As long as the generic headsets have a control button to play/pause or to accept/decline calls, frontline workers can tap the button to start and stop transmissions on walkie talkie.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: OneDrive for Business Opens in-app for Outlook on the web
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Quickly access your OneDrive without having to leave Outlook! Previously, the OneDrive button in Outlook opened a new tab for OneDrive; with this change, you will see OneDrive inline for a consistent and fast experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent Meeting Recap on Teams Mobile (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Intelligent recap is now available on Teams for iOS and Android, so users can access AI-generated meeting notes, AI-generated tasks, and name mentions, and easily browse the meeting recording by speakers. Intelligent recap features are also available as a part of the Copilot for Microsoft 365 license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Preset Organizational Backgrounds (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: When enabled, a user will have a preset background defined by the IT admin without the ability to change the background.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting options updates for Webinars
CurrentVersion.description: The meeting options for a webinar are now accessible within the webinar setup in Teams. Organizers can edit meeting options in an inline window within the scheduling form in Teams.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 Admin Center: Improved issue details for service health
CurrentVersion.description:
We are introducing a new version of the service health issue details pane (the surface that appears when you click on a service incident or service advisory to view details).

The new version substantially reduces the amount of duplicated text and brings key information forward with improved formatting.  This gives you quicker access to the information you need, reducing the time and effort required to get up to speed on service incident details.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Admin setting for uploading files using drag-drop
CurrentVersion.description: Admin will be able to control the default content app for local files uploaded using drag-drop in chat and channels. OneDrive / SharePoint are the existing default locations for uploads using drag-drop.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Registration Form Updates in Webinars
CurrentVersion.description: Organizers can rearrange the sequence of registration form questions that are presented to attendees during the webinar registration process. The questions available for reordering include address, city, state, zip/post code, country/region, job title organization, industry, and custom questions.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Usage reports - Microsoft Copilot with Graph-grounded chat
CurrentVersion.description: ,Microsoft Copilot with Graph-grounded chat usage metrics will be included in the Copilot for Microsoft 365 Usage report. This new feature provides additional usage insights and informs adoption strategy decisions for Microsoft Copilot in your organization.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Connected actions - Viva Pulse integration into Viva Insights Leader deep dive reports
CurrentVersion.description: ,Leaders can send Viva Pulse surveys tailored to new out-of-the-box reports from the Viva Insights app in Microsoft Teams at anytime to add additional context to workplace metrics.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Section Background
CurrentVersion.description: SharePoint now allows you to add an image or gradient color to the sections of the page from a new set of options, including image settings to ensure readability. With this release, we're providing authors to make beautiful pages with featured sections.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Custom image as Section Background
CurrentVersion.description: SharePoint lets you customize the sections backgrounds with your own image. We've enhanced the focal point and introduced more settings like fill mode, overlay, opacity to help you adhere to accessibility best practices and make sure that your contents are clear and readable with customized background. This gives you more power over the image to make your page beautiful.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Windows enrollment attestation
CurrentVersion.description: ,Physical Windows devices will be attested at enrollment that enrollment credentials are stored in the hardware of the device. Administrators can view device attestations in the new Device attestation status report and manually force attestation from that report.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Organize and reorder folders in the new Outlook for Windows and web
CurrentVersion.description: Users can arrange folders in any desired order effortlessly by dragging and dropping the folders in the position that they want.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: New options to copy email items in the new Outlook for Windows and web
CurrentVersion.description: We're thrilled to introduce two new ways to copy email items in the new Outlook for web and Windows that will make your email management even more seamless and efficient.  Ctrl + Drag and Drop: Simply hold down the Ctrl key while dragging and dropping your email items to effortlessly duplicate them. It's a quick and intuitive way to manage your emails with precision.  Ctrl C + Ctrl V: For those who prefer the classic copy-and-paste method, we've got you covered! Just use Ctrl C to copy the email item and Ctrl V to paste it wherever you need.

CurrentVersion.description: We're thrilled to bring you an enhanced folder creation experience! In this update, we've introduced a more intuitive way to manage your folders and accounts. Starting soon, the creation links will be removed, streamlining your interface for a cleaner and more efficient workspace.  What's New: A new ellipsis icon will appear in your left nav bar when hovering the folders and accounts for a quick and easy way to create folders, subfolders or execute the existing folder and account actions ensuring a smoother workflow.  As part of this update, we'll be removing creation links to provide a more focused and user-friendly experience. Rest assured, the traditional right-click method will still be available for your convenience.

Additionally, if customers are licensed for Answers in Viva Engage, this feature will also be available when asking questions on Answers.

To add code snippets, locate the new </> button on the publisher toolbar.

Getting an overview of new meetings you're invited to and RSVP-ing to them directly in the message list becomes much easier with this new filter.

CurrentVersion.description: With this feature, the admins can see more information like name, size, labels about the attachments present in the email that violated the Data Loss Prevention rules.

CurrentVersion.description: ,Quickly access your OneDrive without having to leave Outlook! Users can find and use the OneDrive app in classic Outlook for Windows, for a consistent and fast experience.

You can create or insert Loop components into your OneNote notebook. Navigate to Insert > Loop to create a new component or try pasting a link to an existing component to have it show up in your OneNote canvas.

CurrentVersion.description: With this update, Bookings will be available to customers in GCC High and DoD environments.
